    Who can apply for access ?

    Users and usergroups that can apply for measurement time and expertise on the uNMR-NL equipment

    uNMR-NL consortium - Users from research groups within the consortium
    External Dutch - Users from Dutch research groups outside of the consortium (including collaborations with uNMR-NL members) International - International collaborators or users via iNEXT-Discovery or INSTRUCT
    Non-academic - Users from private organisations

    Request uNMR-NL access

    To request access to NMR equipment at the uNMR-NL facility sites, please send an email to info.unmrnl@gmail.com with a short (one A4 page) description of the requested NMR measurements. For academic users, please also add the scientific background of the project.
